# dynamic-menu

Menu for populate dynamic content

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                             | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `cssClass` | `css-class` | A CSS class to set as the `dynamic-menu` element class. | `string` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot           | Description                           |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `"menu-items"` | The slot where live the menu actions. |
| `"menu-popup"` | The slot where live the menu popups.  |


## Shadow Parts

| Part             | Description                    |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `"menu-content"` | The container of dynamic-menu. |
